question: What is the name of the first spokesperson of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS), who passed away recently?
explanation:
The first spokesperson of Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS), Madhav Govind Vaidya recently passed away.
The 97-year-old leader had earlier recovered from coronavirus infection. He also served as the former Chief Editor of the daily Tarun Bharat. He has a eight decade-old association with RSS, since he joined the movement in 1943.
